WorkItem.Description:
After installing KB3159706 on my WSUS server, I am receiving the "Server version different than console version" error message when using WSUS Package Publisher and I can no longer publish updates.

Server Version: 6.3.9600.18324
Console Version: 6.3.9600.17477

I am using both WPP and the WSUS console on the 2012 R2 server where WSUS is installed.

Any help would be appreciated and thank you for creating WPP!
WorkItem.Summary: Server version different than console version - after installing KB3159706

Comments.Message:
On your local machine go to register and modifing the string :
HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Update Services\Server\Setup\VersionString
Attibute the value : 6.3.9600.18324
If you are using WPP directly on the Wsus server, you have to go to Tools -> Settings -> Servers Tab and checking the option "Connect to local server".
